SELECT p.PRODUCT_NO, p.PRODUCT_NAME productName, p.CONTENT content, p.QUANTITY quantity, p.PRICE price, r.rate FROM PRODUCT p JOIN ( SELECT AVG(REVIEW_RATE) rate, PRODUCT_NO FROM REVIEW GROUP BY PRODUCT_NO ) r ON p.PRODUCT_NO = r.PRODUCT_NO ORDER BY p.PRODUCT_NO DESC

SELECT p.PRODUCT_NO, p.PRODUCT_NAME productName, p.CONTENT content, p.QUANTITY quantity, p.PRICE price, r.rate FROM PRODUCT p JOIN ( SELECT AVG(REVIEW_RATE) rate, PRODUCT_NO FROM REVIEW GROUP BY PRODUCT_NO ) r ON p.PRODUCT_NO = r.PRODUCT_NO WHERE CATEGORY = #{selectedValue} ORDER BY p.PRODUCT_NO DESC

SELECT p.PRODUCT_NO, p.PRODUCT_NAME productName, p.CONTENT content, p.QUANTITY quantity, p.PRICE price, p.TYPE type, r.rate FROM PRODUCT p JOIN ( SELECT AVG(REVIEW_RATE) rate, PRODUCT_NO FROM REVIEW GROUP BY PRODUCT_NO ) r ON p.PRODUCT_NO = r.PRODUCT_NO WHERE CATEGORY = #{selectedValue} WHERE TYPE = #{rbtn} ORDER BY p.PRODUCT_NO DESC
